# Edit user roles

Learn how to navigate the Admin Console to edit user roles, update their information, and save changes.

To edit a user role in OneID, take the following steps:

1.  Navigate to Admin Console > User Roles .
2.  Click the pencil icon ![edit.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/88e28467-bd23-429a-b963-52fe1d34cc73?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..3b69RUldJy4p2nP9lIVXeWIPyxTUjl8ZTxnfaqnqREk) to the right of a user role. The settings window opens.
3.  In the settings window, update the user role information, such as the name, description, or permissions, as needed.
4.  Click Save . Then you can find the changes on the User Roles page.
